channel.title: Removing Staking
channel.description: On TrisidiaX you can dupe staking using Cheat Engine. So how do I remove staking for everyone. you can still duel but you'll need a middleman or something. Thanks:D

item.title: Removing Staking
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

rite4dead:

I want to remove staking. Just staking. Do you can still duel disable staking only.

There’s a Packet which covers Items and other things being placed into the Staking Interface. Banking, Trading, Quick-Deposit, and other such features do the same thing. Comment out the actions (stake 1, stake 5, stake 10, etc). You will probably need to do more after this as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Staking
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

how do I remove staking for everyone. you can still duel but you'll need a middleman or something.

Make up your mind. Do you want to remove it completely for everyone, or edit the current system? A middleman in Dueling is silly, and would require many checks and fail-safes to make it function without flaws. Storing the Stake in memory until a winner is declared is a different story.

P.S. This section is for people who attempt things themselves and need help.

Read full topic
